synopsis.text:
Shun, a young boy claiming to be Ryu's long-lost brother, appears just as Ryu, the reigning Street Fighter champion, grapples with the ominous 'Dark Hadou' that once corrupted Akuma, his master Gouken's brother. As Ryu and his fellow martial artist, Ken, reunite to reflect on their sensei's death, they face an unprecedented challenge. The Dark Hadou within Ryu threatens not only his friends but also the world, as a mysterious scientist seeks to harness the power of the strongest fighters.

Interpol agent Chun-Li takes notice of Ryu's abilities when he confronts agents of the enigmatic Shadowlaw organization, while aspiring martial artist Sakura vows to find Ryu and become his disciple. Shun's sudden kidnapping by Shadowlaw forces Ryu to embark on a journey of self-discovery and master the Dark Hadou to save his supposed brother. As allies unite against this sinister threat, Ryu must confront Akuma, the merciless embodiment of the Dark Hadou. With the fate of his friends and mankind hanging in the balance, can Ryu harness his inner power before it consumes him completely? Join Ryu in this thrilling sequel to the immensely popular Street Fighter II series as he battles to overcome the darkness within and protect those he holds dear.
